key.name: lock-on-suspend
key.description: Lock the screen when the computer is suspended.

key.name: lock-after-screensaver
key.description: Lock the screen after the screensaver has been active for this number of seconds. If 0, locking after the screensaver is disabled.

key.name: lock-on-lid
key.description: Lock the screen when lid of the computer is closed.

key.name: idle-hint
key.description: Set the session idle hint while the screensaver is active.
